Founder and CEO:


Hello Baseball Card Fanatics. My name is Jack Timberlake and for as long as I could remember I loved baseball and collecting baseball cards. I was never really into computers but the apps I loved always had to do with sports. Watching MLBTV on a iphone really enabled me to always feel like I was at home in College. But there was something still missing. The ability to trade, buy, sell, and just talk to my friends about the rareness and value of certain Baseball Cards. That's why I started to create CardHub to Give fanatics the ability to add more Baseball Card Gems to there collection and aww at other's collections.



 
Current Features:
 In our first week, our only features include browsing various baseball cards and buying them.




 
Upcoming Features: 
 The dream I have and the dream I am going to see through is to create a social media website wher people can buy, sell, and trade various baseball cards. It will be a place for baseball card fanatics to interact, show off their collection, view others collections, and talk about the future price value in certain cards



 
 Tip of the Day:
 Buy Low Sell High. Peace.
